010package BinaryRegions;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013import java.util.List;
014
015import ij.IJ;
016import ij.ImagePlus;
017import ij.gui.Overlay;
018import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
019import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
020import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.hulls.AxisAlignedBoundingBox;
022import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
023import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
025import imagingbook.common.regions.BinaryRegion;
026import imagingbook.common.regions.segment.RegionContourSegmentation;
027import imagingbook.core.plugin.IjPluginName;
028
029/**
030 * This plugin creates a binary region segmentation, calculates 
031 * the center and major axis and subsequently the major axis-aligned
032 * bounding box for each region.
033 * Requires a binary image.
034 * 
035 * @author WB
036 * @version 2022/06/23
037 */
038@IjPluginName("Axis-Aligned Bounding Box")
039public class AxisAligned_Bounding_Box_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
040        
041        static Color CenterColor = Color.magenta;
042        static Color BoundingBoxColor = Color.blue;
043
044        private ImagePlus im;
045        
046        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
047                this.im = im;
048                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES; 
049        }
050        
051        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
052                
053                if (!IjUtils.isBinary(ip)) {
054                        IJ.showMessage("Plugin requires a binary image!");
055                        return;
056                }
057                
058                RegionContourSegmentation segmenter = new RegionContourSegmentation((ByteProcessor) ip);
059                List<BinaryRegion> regions = segmenter.getRegions();
060                if (regions.isEmpty()) {
061                        IJ.error("No regions detected!");
062                        return;
063                }
064                
065                ImageProcessor ip2 = ip.duplicate();
066                ip2.add(128);   // brighten
067                
068                // draw bounding boxes as vector overlay
069                Overlay oly = new Overlay();
070                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
071                ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(0.5, BoundingBoxColor));
072                
073                for (BinaryRegion r: regions) {
074                        AxisAlignedBoundingBox box = new AxisAlignedBoundingBox(r);
075                        ola.addShapes(box.getShapes());
076                }
077                
078                ImagePlus im2 = new ImagePlus(im.getShortTitle() + "-aligned-bb", ip2);
079                im2.setOverlay(oly);
080                im2.show();
081        }
082        
083}
